debug(String) - Method in class io.github.nozyx12.jalog.Logger

E

error(String, Throwable) - Method in class io.github.nozyx12.jalog.Logger

io.github.nozyx12.jalog - package io.github.nozyx12.jalog
 

L

Logger - Class in io.github.nozyx12.jalog
Logger is a simple logging utility that logs messages to both the console and a specified log file.
Logger(String) - Constructor for class io.github.nozyx12.jalog.Logger
Creates a logger with a default log file named after the logger's name.
Logger(String, File) - Constructor for class io.github.nozyx12.jalog.Logger
Creates a logger with a specified log file.
LogListener - Interface in io.github.nozyx12.jalog
The LogListener interface defines methods to handle different levels of logging events.

O

onDebug(String) - Method in interface io.github.nozyx12.jalog.LogListener
Called when a debug-level log is generated.
onError(String, Throwable) - Method in interface io.github.nozyx12.jalog.LogListener
Called when an error-level log is generated with an associated throwable cause.
onError(String) - Method in interface io.github.nozyx12.jalog.LogListener
Called when an error-level log is generated without an associated throwable cause.
onInfo(String) - Method in interface io.github.nozyx12.jalog.LogListener
Called when an info-level log is generated.
onWarning(String) - Method in interface io.github.nozyx12.jalog.LogListener
Called when a warning-level log is generated.

R

registerListener(LogListener) - Method in class io.github.nozyx12.jalog.Logger
Registers a new log listener to be notified when logs are generated.

S

stacktrace(Throwable) - Method in class io.github.nozyx12.jalog.Logger
Logs the stack trace of a given throwable cause.

W

warning(String) - Method in class io.github.nozyx12.jalog.Logger
Logs a warning message and notifies registered listeners.
